modules.title: Functional Behavioral Assessment (Elementary): Identifying the Reasons for Student Behavior
modules.description: Functional Behavioral Assessment (FBA) is a process for identifying the function or purpose of a student's behavior. This module covers how to conduct an FBA, identify antecedents and consequences, and develop behavior intervention plans.
